Tools developed to analyze non-stationary noise in gravitational wave detectors.

### **Holonomy in Noise**
**Backend:** `lalsuite` | **Interface:** Dash

A simulation demonstrating how noise curvature induces phase shifts in signal vectors. This tool visualizes the "parallel transport" operator used in my GTSP framework.

## Pedagogical Simulations

Interactive visualizations for teaching General Relativity concepts.

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

**Backend:** `scipy` | **Interface:** Dash

Visualizes null geodesics in Morris-Thorne spacetimes to identify observable lensing signatures of traversable wormholes.
